properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Dear Savior, Thou art mine, How sweet the thought to me; Let me repeat Thy name, And lift my heart to Thee.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Mine! Mine! Mine! I know Thou art mine; Savior, dear Savior, I know Thou art mine.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Thou art the sinner’s friend, So I Thy friendship claim, A sinner saved by grace, When Thy sweet message came.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: So let me sing Thy praise, So let me call Thee mine. I cannot doubt Thy word, I know that I am Thine.
